languages.text: "Я — Злоба, а эта шваль вокруг — мои Ревущие. Мы — гладиаторы, кровоточащее мясо бойцовской арены Губительной жажды. Зверье, выходящее убивать и бесславно гибнуть на потеху Темному городу. А эта нора — наши угодья для развлечений".

traits.locale_text: "Я — Злоба, а эта шваль вокруг — мои Ревущие. Мы — гладиаторы, кровоточащее мясо бойцовской арены Выколотый Глаз. Зверье, выходящее убивать и бесславно гибнуть на потеху Темному городу. А эта нора — наши угодья для развлечений".
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."
languages.original_text: "Я — Злоба, а эта шваль вокруг — мои Ревущие. Мы — гладиаторы, кровоточащее мясо бойцовской арены Губительной жажды. Зверье, выходящее убивать и бесславно гибнуть на потеху Темному городу. А эта нора — наши угодья для развлечений".

traits.locale_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “我是恶棍，这群人都是我的尖啸者。我们是角斗士，是‘致命饥渴’战斗竞技场上的活畜。我们是在竞技场上杀人的禽兽。我们会毫无尊严地丧命，而我们的死会成为黑暗之城的娱乐项目。这个巢穴就是我们的乐土。”
languages.original_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."

traits.locale_text: “我是恶棍，这群人都是我的尖啸者。我们是角斗士，是‘致命饥渴’战斗竞技场上的活肉。我们是在竞技场上杀人的禽兽。我们会毫无尊严地丧命，而我们的死会成为黑暗之城的娱乐项目。这个巢穴就是我们的乐土。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Soy Malicia, y la chusma a la que ves son mis Aulladores. Somos gladiadores, la carne sanguinolenta de la arena de combate de la Sed Letal. Somos las bestias que salen a combatir y a morir lamentablemente para entretenimiento de la Ciudad Siniestra. Este antro es nuestra casa de placer».
languages.original_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."

traits.locale_text: «Soy Malicia, y la chusma a la que ves son mis Aulladores. Somos gladiadores, la carne sanguinolenta de la arena de combate de la Sed Letal. Somos las bestias que salen a combatir y a morir lamentablemente para entretenimiento de la Ciudad Siniestra. Este antro es nuestra casa de placer».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「俺はマリス、そして貴様の周りにいるのはシュリーカーだ。俺らは剣闘士、“宿命の渇き”のアリーナで血を流す肉。仄暗き都の娯楽のために殺し、無惨な死を遂げる獣だ。そして洞穴は我々の快楽の場だ」
languages.original_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はマリス、そして貴様の周りにいるのはシュリーカーだ。俺らは剣闘士、“宿命の渇き”のアリーナで血を流す肉。仄暗き都の娯楽のために殺し、無惨な死を遂げる獣だ。そして洞穴は我々の快楽の場だ」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Ich bin Tücke, und das Pack, das Ihr hier seht, sind meine Kreischer. Wir sind Gladiatoren, das blutende Fleisch der Kampfarena des Fatalen Dursts. Wir sind die Bestien, die töten und unrühmlich sterben, um die Dunkle Stadt zu unterhalten. Und hier amüsieren wir uns."
languages.original_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Tücke, und das Pack, das Ihr hier seht, sind meine Kreischer. Wir sind Gladiatoren, das blutende Fleisch der Kampfarena des Fatalen Dursts. Wir sind die Bestien, die töten und unrühmlich sterben, um die Dunkle Stadt zu unterhalten. Und hier amüsieren wir uns."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Je m'appelle Démon, et ces vermines que vous voyez là, ce sont mes Hurleurs. Nous sommes des gladiateurs, la chair sanguinolente qui combat dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale. C'est nous qu'on envoie tuer et mourir dans le déshonneur pour divertir la Cité Crépusculaire. Et cet antre est notre jardin du plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'appelle Démon, et ces vermines que vous voyez là, ce sont mes Hurleurs. Nous sommes des gladiateurs, la chair sanguinolente qui combat dans l'arène de la Soif Fatale. C'est nous qu'on envoie tuer et mourir dans le déshonneur pour divertir la Cité Crépusculaire. Et cet antre est notre jardin du plaisir. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Adım Melanet, bu gördüklerin de çetemin Çığırtkanları. Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın er meydanında çarpışan gladyatörleriz. Kara Şehir eğlensin diye arenaya çıkıp rezilce ölen ve öldüren ucubeleriz. Burası da bizim keyif tekkemiz."
languages.original_text: "I am Malice, and the rabble you see are my Shriekers. We are gladiators, the bleeding meat of the Fatal Thirst's combat arena. We are the beasts who go out there to kill and to die inglorious deaths for the entertainment of the Dark City. And this den is our pleasure ground."

traits.locale_text: "Adım Melanet, bu gördüklerin de çetemin Çığırtkanları. Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'na ait er meydanında çarpışan gladyatörleriz. Kara Şehir eğlensin diye arenaya çıkıp rezilce ölen ve öldüren ucubeleriz. Burası da bizim keyif yerimiz."
traits.speaker: Anger
